website_summaries.verdict: If you’re looking for a genuinely pure peppermint oil, this is an impressive option at a low price.
pros: Has a pleasant and subtle scent that is not overpowering
Brand is known for its pure and high-quality oils
Comes in sturdy, 1-ounce glass bottle with included dropper
Since oil is pure and strong, not much is needed to see significant results
cons: Peppermint scent tends to fade quickly

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to ward off insects, and it works great! No bugs of any kind since I started spraying it around the perimeter of the house. I use about 5 to 10 drops in a spray bottle the rest is water.
customer_reviews.author: Gamers Helm

customer_reviews.title: Not peppermint. It's spearmint.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought many essential oils through the years. Many of them peppermint. When I used this I noticed right away it doesn't smell like peppermint. It does smell like spearmint. Which isn't awful but not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Big Papa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a mouse issue. After plugging up the holes, laying traps, and putting this oil on cotton balls around the apartment, no more mice!
customer_reviews.author: Christa Avampato

customer_reviews.title: & someone told me that the mice did not like pure peppermint oil
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered because I was having a rodent problem with them getting inside of my motor of my car, & someone told me that the mice did not like pure peppermint oil. This so far has worked wonderful. I was getting tired of having to bring my car into the repair shop and having my mechanic spend over 5 hours trying to find where these little critters had chewed & what wires they had chewed. So far so good, no new signs or rodents. But the weather has now been below 32 * so not sure if they are still around. But so far so good. Ty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I find is good. Smells fine and you can feel the peppermint ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a massage therapist, and I usually use this essential oil for the scalp. I find is good. Smells fine and you can feel the peppermint cooling effect that the oil leaves at contact with it. Good price !
customer_reviews.author: Achille

customer_reviews.title: love it the best natural product out there to use ...
customer_reviews.text: love it the best natural product out there to use to fight against bug infestation and it works would highly recommend this product if your dealing with aints, spiders, fles, mice also you can mix with unscented lotion and use as a bug spray love this oil so many benefits the only thing thing that I didn't like so much the smell was strong but hey I can live with it lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mouse repellant!
customer_reviews.text: I got this oil to try to keep the mice away! It’s done the job - I had been seeing mice “trails” in a corner of my kitchen - ewww!!! After getting the oil and putting it on just 2 cotton pads - no more mice signs!!! My only down side to this purchase is the dropper that is included - not the best quality, it doesn’t pull a full tube in, appears to be a poor fit of the bulb on top. Perhaps the one I received was defective- I’ll give the company the benefit of the doubt there! Otherwise, very satisfied - no mice, and my kitchen smells lovely too!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Tarantino

customer_reviews.title: Pure peppermint oil
customer_reviews.text: I will give this product 10 stars!!!!!!!!! It's amazing and smells fresh !!! Love it so much. I bought it for a spider infestation and mixed it with water and sprayed it around our home. Makes our house smell so good on top of hopefully getting rid of our spiders. Time will tell if it works for that. Thanks for a great product!! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting rid of Roaches and other pests
customer_reviews.text: I really bought this to take care of a roach problem and boy im glad I did! My downstairs neighbors moved out of there unit and when they started moving out we noticed a roach problem. I used household bug spray but nothing worked. I mixed the whole bottle in a spray bottle with two table spoons of rubbing alcohol and the rest with water and sprayed under our sink cabinets and window seals and door ways. Literally stopped seeing roaches and ants the following day! Its been a couple of weeks and still pest free!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Perez

customer_reviews.title: Very Aromatic
customer_reviews.text: Very strong peppermint aroma ...I found it too strong to apply directly to my skin without another substance to mellow it, but dotted it on dark clothes to keep bugs away. The scent is pleasing if you are fond of mint...which I am. I will use it as a mouse deterrent in the fall to keep them from nesting in my car parked in the garage as well as behind my stove, as there is a history of the mice ruining the insulation of my previous gas stove.
customer_reviews.author: dbirdie

customer_reviews.title: Smells like chemicals!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this stuff unless you want to have essential oils that smell like chemicals! I learned my lesson with buying cheap essential oils... they are definitely not worth it. I read through the reviews before purchasing, and most of them left good reviews so I decided to try it - bad decision.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Questionable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using essential oils for over 20 years. I was excited to learn of Artizen's Oils for their reasonable price and large selection. I was surprised when I opened the peppermint because the scent was faint. It had a pleasant one-note smell. Most peppermint oils are very strong and complex. After I apply peppermint, I can taste it as it gets absorbed into my bloodstream. I couldn't taste the Artizen. I question the quality and authenticity. I would not recommend or buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Milford Gal

customer_reviews.title: POTENT... at first.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why anyone would say this isn't very potent because its almost running me out of my house! I bought it to make homemade mouse repellent sachets with ground corncob I put in little burlap bags with drawstrings. This is very good quality peppermint oil, and I'm glad I bought it. I will buy it again! UPDATE: NOT good. The scent went away in just a few days. I'm disappointed in this. First of all, when one takes the lid off of a essential oil, it should knock you back. It seemed strong, but I did notice that the longer it was in the air, the scent faded.
customer_reviews.author: RobinTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Bamboozled!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m mad that the photo fakes you out like your getting $8.99 worth by how the bottle size looks when you are about to make a purchase. It is only a pinch worth of peppermint oil... I am extremely unhappy that I paid $8.99 for a $3.99 bottle! Very unhappy... it taught me a valuable lesson. Slow down making purchases on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: VERNETTA

customer_reviews.title: It's strong, only a few drops needed.
customer_reviews.text: These are very good, strong, and works wonderfully with my body lotions, and hair oils which i mix w/Castor oil for healthy scalp/new growth...I also mix the orange oil with my pure cacao oil and use on my body to heal scars, moisturize and even out the skin. All you need is a couple of drops!
customer_reviews.author: Yenny Polanco

customer_reviews.title: It's not your regular peppermint Oil !
customer_reviews.text: This is strong stuff! I bought this product as a natural way to rid my home of mice. A few drops on a few cotton balls is all it took! The mice left the house and me too! My eyes started burning and tearing omg! I think I used too much of Artizen peppermint! It's worth the money but use it sparingly. I will try using it for my aches and pains next time. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Come With a Dropper
customer_reviews.text: Bought this peppermint essential oil in order to ward off centipedes. The oil smells great. I would give it 5 stars, but it didn't come with a dropper! It doesn't even have one of those openings with a built in dropper. Luckily I had a spare dropper from a oil roller set or else it would've been a complete mess trying to get the oil in the bottle I was using, and measuring would've just been impossible.
customer_reviews.author: AJay_89

customer_reviews.title: peppermint
customer_reviews.text: first time using peppermint oil and its actually more potent than I thought it would be. a couple drop and my drink and room becomes pepperminty lol. I orignially bought this product to annoy the mouse into leaving my home but turns out i found better use or the oil. the aroma is strong and dont need more than a drop or 2 for a drink or air freshener
customer_reviews.author: shakespeare

customer_reviews.title: UPSET
customer_reviews.text: I am super upset because the description says HUGE 1 oz bottle and when I received it, it is more of the size of a .5 miniature bottle that I almost threw away because I didn’t even notice it in the box -_- I like to use peppermint oil for my baths and face but this should not be used on the skin. This is more meant for a diffuser/bathe oil where it can be easily diluted in water. Not a face or skin, multi use oil. So I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: It's just like water in consistancy.
customer_reviews.text: This is only the 2nd bottle of Peppermint Essential oil I have bought, but the first brand I tried was Cliganic, if was great, the oil stayed in the dropper until you were ready to squeeze the dropper at the location you wanted it. This brand, the Antizen is very watery, you have to fill the dropper, remove carefully, turn it upside down until your at your cotton ball, otherwise you have it everywhere on the counters or floor. I will not purchase this brand again. Unfortunately when I was buying again, Amazon did not have the peppermint oil in the Cliganic brand so that's why I tried the Antizen brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size difference in bottles.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it the first time I purchased but the second time I ordered the SAME product amount, price and 1oz but the comparison in size is definitely concerning...I feel jipped the second time around! Would continue to buy if the sizes were honest because the oils are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mae & Santi Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the spiders away!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product religiously to keep spiders away! I used to find a big thick house spider in my bedroom probably once a week 😱 I haaaaate spiders and I read peppermint oil keeps them away, I started using this oil by dropping droplets near the door jam, window sill, and behind furniture in the room, and I haven’t seen a spider in my bedroom in probably a year now (knock on wood). Definitely recommend this for spider detourant! We even use it on the patio furniture now. Every other week or so I will reapply the oil to ensure it keeps the spiders away :)
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Love smelling peppermint
customer_reviews.text: I have several (really lots) of totes of papers - wanted to get them out of a closet and put into the garage. Didn't want insects, especially spiders, to find their way into the totes, so I have very small plastic containers with a couple of cotton balls and added several drops of peppermint oil. Checked under the lids of a few totes several days later and could really smell the peppermint -- NICE! Have been told to make a spray and use around doorways or even all inside the garage -- besides smelling fresh, I hope not to find mice or any insects!!
customer_reviews.author: BBK

customer_reviews.title: This review is only for people looking for mouse repellent ...
customer_reviews.text: This review is only for people looking for mouse repellent. It does not work against rats. Yesterday, as soon as I received the product, I made a plastic cup with holes and dropped loads of oil inside cup, on top of a paper towel. I placed the cup by the backdoor where rats come in. Rat was literally right next to the cup with loads of oil scent and looking for a small gap between the screen door to come in.
customer_reviews.author: MYMY

customer_reviews.title: It is a great peppermint smell, strong and last a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.text: It's the best peppermint smell I have tried by far. Clear out your sinus, and I have ordered it twice so far. Does not help with pain, maybe if you have a cold it could help with sinus pressure? I don't know what pain it is suppose to help with?? I used it almost everyday, 2-4 squirts, and it lasted about 45 days. Only negative I can think of is I think if you are prone to heartburn to that it might bring it on, especially if you use a lot or often. Could be a fluke, but seemed to have more heartburn episodes when I used a lot and often. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: bd

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong of a scent as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product actually to mix with water in a spray bottle to get rid of spiders on my porch. I haven’t had a chance to try it yet but I was surprised how mild the 100% oil was. I expected a stronger smell I also bought a bottle of eucalyptus oil...same/mild. The 2 bottles boxed separately had 2 diff type caps on bottles. Although peppermint was sealed it leaked about 1/4 bottle in box during transit and was missing the dropper as well (even tho the bubble wrap for the dropper was in the box with the oil. Weird.
customer_reviews.author: Christy J

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to get rid of ants and spiders. They hate peppermint. When I spray my garage, I have never seen ants move so fast, as well as, spiders. I use it indoors and the aroma is incredible. I mix 5 to 10 drops into 16 ounce spray bottle with a couple of drops of Dawn liquid soap, shake, and then it's ready. I don't like to kill anything so this drives them away. As far as the aroma, I squirt a little in my bedroom and it gives me a better nights sleep. I am beginning to notice the decrease in the spider population in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A.

customer_reviews.title: Bought to deter mice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I found a smushed baby mouse in my under-sink cabinet. I heard that mice do not like peppermint, so I got this oil, took off the cap, and put it under the sink. So far I have not seen any more mice, and I do smell the pleasant peppermint scent. So, for my purposes, this worked exactly as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: chicagoliz

customer_reviews.title: Weaker than other brands
customer_reviews.text: I go through peppermint essential oil a lot faster than my other oils, so I am always on the look out for a good oil at a good price. This brand was a lot weaker than other brands I have used in the past. I have to use 3x as much to get a hint of what I get with my other oils. I went ahead and used the whole bottle, but it hasn't been very effective and I will be looking elsewhere for my next peppermint oil purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Works great for campers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my camper during winter storage. So far I haven’t had any mice inside. I also put moth balls around the tires and the jack (anything that they can crawl up on) I bought one of the essential oils brown sprayers and put a couple drops of this in and the rest water and it was pretty strong. And I just sprayed it all over the inside. I’m gonna go back and repeat the process half way through the winter just as precaution.
customer_reviews.author: Cummins08

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent...believe it or not I used it to soak cotton & place in a cabinet that rodents were going to. It worked! They don’t like the scent. It is a temporary fix, but the entrance/exit just got patched, so I used it to drive them out. This should be the end of the problem now. I wanted to use something natural in the house & this worked great! Made the cupboard smell minty & fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Doctam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Product. I mixed peppermint essential oil (10 drops) it with 90% (1/3) alcohol and water(1/3 . I use it for for bathroom cleaning (floor) leave a wonderful clean finish. Also good for spray over your bed and leave it for half an hour, help clean and prevent bed bugs. I also spray around the front and the back doors of my house to prevent the spiders and other bugs (We live in New Mexico)
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: I'm so disappointed! Replacement quickly!
customer_reviews.text: My Peppermint Essential oil bottle was not filled to the top. I have received many bottles from various co.panies and this is a first! From the 3 pictures taken the seal wasnt broken and 1/4 of my bottle is missing. I needed this oil to complete my mixture and I read all the reviews on all brands and chose your. I'm disappointed but hope you can remedy this quickly. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Eve M.

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think the peppermint oil was very concentrated. I use the peppermint oil diluted in water to use as a insect deterrent/repellent. I ended up using the whole bottle in order for the peppermint scent to come through. A different brand I have used in the past was a lot more concentrated and potent. Also, I did not receive a dropper to dispense the oil, which wasn’t a huge deal considering I had to use the bottle in its entirety in one use. I would not purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Ant Prevention
customer_reviews.text: I had hired a pest control company to treat my home for ants. They rescheduled the appointment and I am not at all sure they will come because of the corona virus. A friend told me that peppermint was effective in eliminating ants. I had a spray bottle. I put peppermint and water in the bottle and have been spraying the area around my tub and shower. I see very little evidence of ants after this treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Pajari

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My reason was for wasp repellent, I wanted to enjoy my balcony and made a DIY spray from this oil, didn't see any effect so far. Wasps keep coming. But I can see why, scent is definitely not strong enough, the second I spray; smell is just gone. Also this one is WAAAY overpriced, I found x5 times cheaper in Amazon. I cannot return since the item is not Prime eligible, so it's just waste of money and hope.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Peppermint Essential Oil
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as I read the smell was a repellent for mice. I immediately placed some of the essential oil on some cotton balls. I haven’t seen a mouse since, and the aroma gives the house a pleasant aroma.
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible. Not real peppermint
customer_reviews.text: This is not real peppermint. This is some synthetic version of what someone *thinks* peppermint *might* smell like. It’s so fake and chemical smelling it gave me a headache from the first unfortunate whiff. I normally buy another brand of organic peppermint essential oil that smells like real peppermint. This stuff is fake and a mistake. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. drake

customer_reviews.title: always good to have
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my first camping trip. I read that it keep ticks a way. I also know that it keep rodents away too. Worked very well i heard a raccoon near by and ran off. no bits of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the dropper
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my second bottle, first bottle came with a dropper. The last bottle did not. Thought I could just use the one from first bottle (same size) but it won’t fit. New bottle came with an odd plastic stopper, no idea what it’s function is. I use the peppermint to detour spiders, moths & flies. It’s great for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for drops this isn't the right essential oil
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would dispense tiny drops. Instead it doesn't have a dispensing mechanisms. I pours out. Other manufacturers peppermint essentials oils smell more life pure peppermint. This does not unless I got one defective bottle. It didn't provide the same pain relief of other brands. I am not pleased. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Oggie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scent & pest repellent
customer_reviews.text: My purchase was intended for stench in our home from critters and to use for pest control. Uhg, we have rats & spiders. Because of all our pets, poison was out of the questions. Stocked up on, traps, plug in device’s, peppermint oil, & blocked any access points. We took aggressive action to avoid a costly exterminator bill. With in 3 days, spiders where fleeing from nooks & crannys, no nightly scratching sounds coming through our vents, attic, etc. Yes, I do highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: christina sayers

customer_reviews.title: Steep price for small bottle, but cheaper than most brands
customer_reviews.text: I have not personally used this product, but it was in the concoction I used to keep the voles out of my strawberry patch. Apparently, peppermint keeps voles away. It worked like a charm. I found the price was a little steep, but after looking for a cheaper price, this seems to be the cheapest for the amount it had.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Get Eucalyptus Scent - Don’t Buy Peppermint Scent
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased Eucalyptus Scent and it worked great in humidifier/diffuser. Thought that this was a good brand so I purchased the peppermint scent. Dissatisfied with the peppermint scent because the smell was FAINT! I was hoping that it was going to work really well because I LOVE THE SMELL of PEPPERMINT BUT DISAPPOINTED that it did not produce the desired result.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi 1

customer_reviews.title: Would have been nice...
customer_reviews.text: The oil had a beautiful sent. I would have loved to use it and enjoy it. However, the oil leaked all over the packing box. It looked ad though the lid was loose (even though it still had the plastic protective film in place. I ended up going to Target to get the oil and have requested a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Just Love It
customer_reviews.text: A friend was telling me about this product and I was a bit skeptical but I was surprised. I've been a weightlifter for 45+ years and lately my bicep and shoulder area's have been a bit inflamed with pain. I've also been using a "Tens Massager" and between the two of them I have had great results. I'm going to put a little on right now and hit the gym. Give it a shot, you might get a pleasant surprise also! Copper 1795
customer_reviews.author: copper 1795

customer_reviews.title: I'm very calm and it smells oh soooo good. I've been using Rose Oil
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would more than likely energize me, but no, I'm very calm and it smells oh soooo good. I've been using Rose Oil, so a bit hesitant to even buy this oil. But I really love it. I'm going to buy 2 more diffusers and put them in other rooms with this same oil, I love it is in a larger size instead of the small bottles, I won't need to run and buy more later in the month. My diffuser on alternating on and off, I get 15 hrs of great air. Wonderful, I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: carolyn b.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this peppermint for the purpose of making a non-toxic potion to get rid of ants. I'd read to mix peppermint with either just water or combo of water and vinegar or witch hazel or vodka. Peppermint is supposedly the key ingredient that repels ants, however, this did not work for me. I tried the mixture and also just the peppermint itself on a cotton ball, swiping in the crevices the ants are coming through. The ants are still coming in - peppermint does not keep them away. It does smell nicer than Raid!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! After Our local earth date closed down we needed to get our essential oil (peppermint) from somewhere! This was our first choice and we will be ordering more from now on. The smell is great. We use it to dab a little on temples when we get headaches and also it helps my husband with allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Loving this! I've ordered 4 bottles ;-)
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with the scent of peppermint and this has definitely done the trick. I have quite a few things in storage and have used peppermint essential oils in the past as a pest repellent so far so good with using this. I also like to spray this around my home because its safe around pets and keeps the pest at bay for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: ashclark_25

customer_reviews.title: Smell fabulous and Works great for natural wasp deterrent.
customer_reviews.text: Product smells just as it should. Packaging was perfect. Peppermint is a natural deterrent to wasps so I wanted to try using for that purpose. I placed it around the top edges of my parcel delivery box and so far NO WASPS!
customer_reviews.author: DANA S.

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and good price
customer_reviews.text: Does peppermint oil smells wonderful and is priced very well. It comes with a dropper cap also and you can replace the regular cap so that the dropper cap is on it permanently. What I like is that the dropper cap is a safety cap so it can't accidentally come open and spill. I'm very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Picture is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: This is some pretty strong stuff however the image displayed is deceiving. This arrives in a very small glass bottle. NOT what is pictured. So make sure you pay attention to the oz you will receive. It also states in the description "HUGE" this is NOT huge. So buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Debra S Gentry

customer_reviews.title: smells like candy, burns like fire.
customer_reviews.text: i find the droppers on these tend to corrode, they all seem the same. i think this one is still holding up though. the peppermint has a nice smell, candy cane like, and not medicine like how many smell. i use it to scent my shea butter. don't get it on your skin or near your eyes unless you like the self torture, then go right ahead.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoKing

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Candy Canes
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of this oil. It reminds me of Christmas. If you are looking for a true peppermint fragrance, this is the essential oil for you. I bought this to deter mice from my home. I live in a wooded area and mice-proofing is necessary. It’s too soon to tell if it works for that purpose but if it doesn’t, the purchase was still worthwhile because I love how the oil makes my home smell!
customer_reviews.author: GGINBee

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Bought it to help clear out ants
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Bought it to help clear out ants, spiders and other small insects that kept getting into my home. My neighborhood is like a little country town with lot's of trees and grass. It's been helping to kill what was already in the house and keep out the rest. I haven't seen any insects like I use to prior to the 2 weeks since I've been using this oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very watery and not peppermint.
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed was that it was very watery. It is not oily at all. Second thing i noticed was when I tried to put the dropper cap they sent with the product it does not fit the bottle. Then as I used the product it was not the right smell. So I went back and got one of my tiny oil bottles I get locally and smelled it to compare and it is not peppermint. Buyer beware as this is not what it says it is.
customer_reviews.author: Liann

customer_reviews.title: For the price, wish the 4oz bottle was filled to the top
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet so I will be back. We are attempting to put this oil on cotton balls to combat our ground squirrel takeover! I sure hope I come back and say, this stuff works!!! I'm back. I regret my first post. I guess these ground squirrels are making me crazy and a bit irritable as well. I can say the cotton balls soak up 4 ounces of product very quickly so our battle is too big to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Smells delightful
customer_reviews.text: This item smells delightful. The only issue I had was that it doesn’t comes with a guard to slow it down when you pouring it. Way too easy to dispense. Other than that, it says 100% pure and I believe it. Will buy again when I run out. Absolutely love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: B Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help keep unwanted pests (spiders) away. Although it's a bit soon to see how well that purpose works it does do a good job of making my home smell nice.
customer_reviews.author: jayne

customer_reviews.title: Use to keep mice away
customer_reviews.text: I use Artizen Peppermint Essential Oil to keep mice from invading my house. My 100 year+ house has some gaps where these rascals get in. Oil soaked cotton pads are placed at all entrances and areas where they've been seen. Seems to work and smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: 1st Chair

customer_reviews.title: Not pure oil! Made me sick!
customer_reviews.text: This is not pure oil! I don't know what's in it but it made me terribly sick! I made a vinegar and water mixture and added the peppermint oil for scent. I used it to mop my floor. I was barefooted and right after I mopped my mouth started burning. Then I got dizzy, weak and started throwing up. It lasted about an hour and then I was better. It was something in the oil that got in through the pores in my feet. Br careful where thou buy your oils. Just because it says its pure does not mean it is!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: using it for tooth powder and mice
customer_reviews.text: I got it originally for a natural tooth powder I'm making, but used it for mice instead, I haven't seen any. Downside...It seemed strong at first, but I ordered peppermint from NOW to compare because I had to rewet my cottonballs the scent weakend.
customer_reviews.author: R Moultrie

customer_reviews.title: Peppermint scent
customer_reviews.text: This oil worked for the mice and ant in my kitchen The product is worth the money The bottle is pretty small but it’s worth it and I would try again I also used some of it to mop with and it smelled good through the house
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Happy with peppermint oil purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Prompt and safe delivery (item was packed safely). The scent is peppermint as described and works perfect in my diffuser. I think the scent might be a little stronger than the essential oil I have bought OTC. Great price too! Luv it!
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping bugs away
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it at the entrance of my garage to keep bugs out and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Hakan Mustafa

customer_reviews.title: Nice in Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: While I'm not sure just how pure this is, it's great in my diffuser at work. I use it in my office and everyone who comes in likes the fragrance. Because it's a little on the strong side, I'd start off with just a few drops so as not to feel as if you're in a candy cane forest!
customer_reviews.author: I. KingTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Stinks!!
customer_reviews.text: The bottle had been leaking when I received it. The smell was horrendous!! It took forever to get it washed off of my hands. I have never smelled anything so bad. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong, the way I like it.
customer_reviews.text: The peppermints scent is strong the way I like. I put a few drops on a cotton ball; place it somewhere in my office and it last for days. When others steps into my office, they always comment how refreshing it is. I can't comment on the pain aspect because that's not why I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Mer-is-me

customer_reviews.title: Literally works for everything !
customer_reviews.text: I literally use this oil for EVERYTHING. It helps with hair growth and my hairs looks pretty amazing after I started using this with other home remedies. It has clears my acne bumps. I use this after I work out and it helps my muscles relax and my whole body too, and most importantly I use this for repellent. It’s already summer and this is the only thing that keeps the mosquitoes, and insects away from my house!
customer_reviews.author: Mijeiry

customer_reviews.title: So many possibilities
customer_reviews.text: This oil is also good for keeping mice and other rodents from coming into your home. Pour some in a spray bottle and spray the threshold of any door and closet. It really works
customer_reviews.author: Tanya L Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The essential oil arrived the first time and half of it had leaked out. You could smell it even before I opened the packaging. I did the return and the company had the replacement to me in a day. Great customer service. The essential oil was as described and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: PG & CM

customer_reviews.title: Home remedy to keep mice away
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it works. I am not comfortable putting out traps or poison. Instead, I put a few drops on cotton balls and place in strategic areas of the attic. We went the entire fall and winter without any mice. I refresh the cotton every few weeks; more so in the fall and winter when the critters would be more apt to be looking for warm quarters. A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: peppermint essential oil
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of peppermint. this is not too strong and i use it everyday on joint pain, or my hair. It works great. I plan to keep this in stock. the price was good came packaged great. no breakage. easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Strong odor, full strength. The only issue I had is that the eye dropper was broken in the box, and I had to find another to use...possibly plastic would be a better material than glass for the dropper, or it should have been secured somehow instead of rolling around in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought the oil to use in the yard around the pool for mosquito repellant. Seems to be working pretty well. The oil is very concentrated so when the bottle is open we can smell it throughout that entire area of the house. Seems like a good quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Tykate

customer_reviews.title: Smells pretty good, I feel like it should be stronger but maybe I'm wrong
customer_reviews.text: Smelled great, however didn't smell very strong. Maybe I received a weak batch this time (3rd purchase) but I'll give it another shot and see if it improves. I use it with a mixture of other essential oils in my diffuser at night to help clear my sinuses, but this is definitely one of the key ingredients. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Morganational

customer_reviews.title: It does deter rodents
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for aroma therapy a few drops in water. I’ve also used as a rodent repellent. A spray bottle and about 30 drops and I spray around the perimeter of a summer cottage as a deterrent. I’ve noticed less spiders too. I have a pet dog and do not want to use anything toxic so this helps. It needs repeated applications but I enjoy the smell so it’s ok for me.
customer_reviews.author: marjala

customer_reviews.title: VERY Strong scent and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use peppermint essential oil very frequently for many uses. I make my own cleaning products, deodorants, body powers, other bath products, and air fresheners among many other things from these oils. The peppermint oil is my favorite. I even put some on cotton balls and place them in my attic to repel critters and it works! I will order more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Southern CharmTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good mouse repellent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the oil after reading multiple reviews about peppermint oil keeping mice away. I put several drops of the oil on cotton balls and placed it in the areas around my house where we typically have a mouse problem. So far so good. But the winter isn’t here yet so not totally sure which is why the 4 star rating. Also diluted it and used as a spray to keep grandma’s cat out of certain areas in her house. It is a great option to have something I can use that has a pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Pickel

customer_reviews.title: It does not have any control mechanism to prevent it from coming out all at once.
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be larger. I could buy this for under $5! There is no control spout so it spills out completely. All at once! It does smell good. They should package it better in the bottle with a spout! Delivery was great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Minty smell is minty
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a mist diffuser. I love the fresh clean smell. Didn’t come with a dropper but I happened to have one. That’s really the only complaint. Smells just like a peppermint as one would expect since it IS peppermint oil. Added too much to the diffuser the first time and was punched in the face with mint.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle I received was open and had leaked some out ( you could smell through the packaging) so cotacted Amazon & it was replaced with a new one that was in perfect condition right away. Smells good
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Good General Use
customer_reviews.text: Simply for scenting candles, making insect repellent, etc. it is a nice, low cost item. It seemed to lack the intensity of amore expensive essential oil but great for general use.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: ALONG WITH PRAYERS 🤲, THE BEST MOUSE REPELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product as a mouse repellent. I mixed about 2 teaspoons with 1/4 cup of rubbing alcohol, 2 tablespoons of cayenne pepper in 8 ounces of water. By God's Grace and needed prayers it worked like a charm!!! I've been using this brand and others for a while and I have not seen any more mice. I had a TERRIBLE PROBLEM!!!😖 Even caught a few on sticky traps. But this repellent (and the prayers....you gotta believe) really sent those little vermin back from wherever they came from. Thank God Almighty-PRAISE HIM MUCH!!!🤲
customer_reviews.author: lnapier

customer_reviews.title: Be mindful where you put it it lasts for several hours on your hands
customer_reviews.text: Great to rub on your joints elbows knees ankle back add oregano oil and castor oil cold-pressed oil what that does is remove the inflammation and the aching depend on the level of your arthritis or rheumatoid arthritis good for your wrist and fingers to make sure you don't touch your private area or get in your eyes it's a stinger.. lol 😂😮
customer_reviews.author: Evangelist KEYSHIA L NORMAN

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and works great
customer_reviews.text: I love using essential oils like peppermint oil for rodents abatement instead of traps or poisons since I have pets that can be harmed by poisons. This Artizen Peppermint Oil has done a great job and smells great to. It also works great on sore achy feet and legs.
customer_reviews.author: K.A. Holt

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a refreshing, crisp peppermint fragrance to use in my diffuser. This fragrance is very medicinal and not pepperminty at all. Will be tossing it out.
customer_reviews.author: lsfritsch

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to look for a better one. The smell is a bit off to me.
customer_reviews.author: Liane

customer_reviews.title: Nicely packed
customer_reviews.text: This bottle came very well packed since it is a glass bottle. I got the peppermint to create an organic DIY spider spray. Looking forward to using it and smelling the peppermint.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Nauman

customer_reviews.title: Smells great.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as a mouse deterrent for cars that we keep in the barn. There are always nice in barns, and they love climbing wheels to nest in engine compartments. It stinks; sometimes literally. Nice hate the smell of mint so I put peppermint oil on the tires every couple of weeks. Two months later... no mice yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mikul

customer_reviews.title: Fresh smell in my home (rv).
customer_reviews.text: Very nice love it. Thought I was getting the big bottle as shown on their site. Its great though. I use it to keep mice out of our RV. They dont like the smell and on top of this my house (rv) smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I received this peppermint oil and used it in my diffuser and it smells wonderful the sent last for 8 hours in my diffuser. I will purchase this item again great product.
customer_reviews.author: Paulsmom1995

customer_reviews.title: The Bottle is to small
customer_reviews.text: hello and i was very disappointed with this product i feel like i was deceived the picture on amazon clearly appears to be a big bottle or at least and med.size one but that tiny bottle was a disappointment so maybe i need to look else where for the same product but in a larger bottle no problem at all with the peppermint oil only the size the photo shows a bigger bottle. thanks
customer_reviews.author: ms porsha

customer_reviews.title: Peppermint home remedy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bottle as I heard using peppermint essential oil cools your body when placed in the back of the neck. It works. I also use it to repel insects. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cupanne

customer_reviews.title: Pure heaven scent!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic to put in a spray bottle spray around the house. No perfumes just pure peppermint. We are allergic to so many things but this is pure and causes no problems. In case you didn’t know it’s a deterrent for bugs and mice and spiders,etc!! We are lucky not to have any of that but if you do even spray the threshold to the doors.
customer_reviews.author: bonjovi

customer_reviews.title: DONT USE AROUND CATS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make my own spider repellant. They HATE peppermint. Only thing is, I have cats & it CAN give your baby respitory issues
customer_reviews.author: J Wentzel

customer_reviews.title: Bottle arrived leaking and possibly tampered with!
customer_reviews.text: When we received the item, it was leaking in the package. The plastic wrap on it wasn’t on all the way, and when we removed the cap the peel away seal was already off, hence the leaking. We suspect that someone tampered with it, but we are just using it to make an anti-spider spray. We are unhappy with how the product was handled and possibly tampered with but, and it’s too much of a hassle to bring it to a UPS store to return such a small vial.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Maile

customer_reviews.title: Scent lasts longer than the other brands I know
customer_reviews.text: I drop a few drops in hot water in an open hot cup and place it beside my 4 year old daughter's bed at nights to help her breathe better as she always gets stuffy and coughs at nights. It reduces her stuffiness and also stops her coughing allowing her to get a more restful sleep. Although I prefer the scent of another brand I am used to, this one's scent definitely lasts longer. Maybe up to 3 or 4 times longer for me. I will repurchase for sure when it finally finishes
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I've used many different brands of peppermint oil, and have always enjoyed the brisk fragrance. This does not smell like peppermint to me. It smells sour.
customer_reviews.author: Lorinda S. Mckinnon

product_meta.title: Artizen Peppermint Essential Oil (100% Pure & Natural - UNDILUTED) Therapeutic Grade - Huge 1oz Bottle - Perfect for Aromatherapy, Relaxation, Repel M
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Peppermint| Size:1 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)100% Pure Peppermint Essential Oil by Artizen
feature_bullets: GUARANTEED HIGHEST QUALITY, MOST POTENT PEPPERMINT OIL - What sets Artizen Essential Oils apart are their unparalleled purity and concentration. Natural, with no adulterants or dilution, their oils provide the maximum benefit possible and are uncompromising.

DON'T FALL VICTIM TO CHEAP DILUTED PEPPERMINT OIL - Most of the Competition Dilute Their Oil with a Cheap Carrier Oil or Even Other Potentially Dangerous Chemicals. Our Peppermint Oil is Routinely Tested for Purity And Other Unique Qualities in Order to Ensure You Are Buying The Purest Oil Available

MOST 4 OUNCE PEPPERMINT OILS CONTAIN LESS THAN 1/3 OF NATURAL OIL - Unfortunately, there's a lot of misrepresentation of the term 100% Oil, However it's usually only 1/3 of the Natural Oil and 2/3 Carrier Oil.
HIGH QUALITY BOTTLES - We use high quality bottles infused with a uv colored coating to protect essential oils against sunlight and degradation.

LIFETIME WARRANTY AND GUARANTEE - The manufacturer, Artizen Essential Oils, offers a lifetime warranty and guarantee on their product. If you are ever unsatisfied for any reason they will replace your product or refund your money. And they stand behind and guarantee the purity of their oils.
